title: The Plan to convert the Ayurvedic Hospital of Borella into a Teaching Hospital -Second Phase
decision_details: - The proposal made by Hon. (Dr.) Rajitha Senarathna, Minister of Health and Indigenous Medicine, to revise the contract cost from Rs.728 million to Rs.1,113 million as recommended by the Cost Estimate Examination Committee to develop the Ayurvedic Hospital, Borella as a Teaching Hospital, was approved by the Cabinet.
